name: Bear Tracks
description:
"Go hide! I'll distract them!"

Dekota and Miska were run over by a pack of people while eating salmon. Miska was supposed to hide and Dekota tried to fend off the people and lure them away. After the people were successfully expelled, Dekota realized that Miska was no longer in his hiding place. They were separated from each other.

Afraid that something might have happened to Miska, Dekota immediately sets out to find his little brother. In doing so, he discovers traces that the little one has left behind.

- Floating leafs
- Disapearing clouds
- Falling trees
- Many fireflies
- Cutscenes




Music and Sounds

 EpidemicSounds



   HOW TO DOWNLOAD

1. Download .zip
2. Unpack
3. Start .exe
4. Enjoy! :)

Tipp: Best Lightning Expierence in Graphic Quality "Medium"
